Animations & Micro-interactions

Explore various animations and micro-interactions that enhance user experience and provide visual feedback. These subtle details can make a significant difference in how users perceive and interact with a website.

Hover Effects

Scale Effect

A simple scale effect that enlarges the button when hovered, providing visual feedback.

Shadow Effect

A shadow effect that creates depth and elevation when the button is hovered.

Gradient Effect

A gradient effect that transitions the background color when the button is hovered.

Loading Animations

Spinner

A classic spinner animation used to indicate loading or processing.

Pulse

A pulse animation that creates a breathing effect to indicate activity.

Dots

A simple dots animation that creates a typing effect to indicate loading.

Page Transitions

Fade In

This element fades in when triggered.

A fade-in effect that gradually reveals content.

Slide In

This element slides in from the left when triggered.

A slide-in effect that moves content into view from the side.
